summary.span: 命名空间提供高级 GDI+ 排版功能。

span.span: The namespace provides advanced GDI+ typography functionality.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 基本图形功能由 命名空间提供。Basic graphics functionality is provided by the namespace. 此命名空间中的类允许用户创建和使用的字体的集合。The classes in this namespace allow users to create and use collections of fonts. > [!CAUTION] > 类中命名空间不支持的 Windows 或 ASP.NET 服务中的使用。Classes within the namespace are not supported for use within a Windows or ASP.NET service. 尝试使用在这些应用程序类型之一中的这些类可能会产生意外的问题，如降低服务性能和运行时异常。Attempting to use these classes from within one of these application types may produce unexpected problems, such as diminished service performance and run-time exceptions.
